scripts.hybrid-build: NODE_ENV=hybrid webpack -p --config webpack.release.config.js && zip -r hybridFiles/whole/rentCar_oversea.zip new-release && rm -r new-release
scripts.set-version: git branch >> gitBranch.txt && git log -1 --pretty=format:'%H'>>gitLog.txt && node setHybridVersion.js && rm gitBranch.txt && rm gitLog.txt
scripts.hybrid-update: rm hybridFileList.txt && git diff cb7faf83 d0efe7ac --name-only>>hybridFileList.txt && node hybridList.js && cat hybridFileList.txt | xargs zip update.zip
